optional_day_trips.departure_station: Beijing South Railway Station (北京南站)
optional_day_trips.arrival_stations: Tianjin Railway Station (天津站), Tianjin West, or Tianjin South
optional_day_trips.notes: One of China's busiest intercity routes with very frequent service. C2001-C2198 are non-stop trains (21-30 min). C2201-C2268 stop at Wuqing station (~45-60 min). Odd numbers depart from Beijing, even numbers return to Beijing. Maximum speed 350 km/h. Perfect for day trip - can leave morning, explore Tianjin, return evening. Book tickets via 12306.cn or at station.
optional_day_trips.recommendation: Excellent day trip option for days when girlfriend is busy (Feb 26-27, Mar 4-5) or free days (Feb 25, Mar 3). Very affordable and frequent service makes it flexible - no need to book far in advance.

booking_recommendations.notes: Official China Railway booking platform. Now has English interface. Best prices and most reliable. Requires phone number verification.
English-friendly third-party platform. Easier for foreigners, small service fee. Good for comparing options and booking in advance.
Chinese version often has better deals and more train options. Use if comfortable with Chinese interface.

important_notes: High-speed rail tickets in China can be booked 15 days in advance (previously 30 days, changed in 2023-2024).
Real-name registration required for all train tickets - bring passport.
Arrive at train stations at least 20-30 minutes before departure for security checks.
Chinese New Year period (Feb 15-22, 2026) is peak travel season - book Chongqing-Bazhong and Bazhong-Chengdu trains as soon as possible to avoid sold-out situations.
For airport transfers, always have destination addresses written in Chinese for taxi drivers.
Mobile payment (WeChat Pay, Alipay) is preferred in China - set up before arrival if possible.
DiDi (Chinese Uber) is convenient for airport transfers - can be used with international credit cards.
All train station and airport names should be verified closer to travel dates as services may change.
